typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
source2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
Join1 sink() ~> sink2
